title: fanoutqa: What companies have ever had a market capitalization in excess of 1 trillion US dollars and approximately how many employees did each of those companies have in recent years? (5aa09932011c8fcd)

chat_history.content: What companies have ever had a market capitalization in excess of 1 trillion US dollars and approximately how many employees did each of those companies have in recent years?

Several companies have achieved a market capitalization of over 1 trillion USD at some point in their history. Here are some examples, along with their approximate number of employees in recent years:

- **Apple Inc.** - Apple became the first U.S. company to reach a $1 trillion market cap in August 2018 and later surpassed $2 trillion in 2020. As of 2022, Apple had approximately 154,000 full-time employees worldwide.

- **Microsoft Corporation** - Microsoft surpassed a $1 trillion market cap in April 2019 and has since crossed the $2 trillion mark. In 2022, Microsoft had around 221,000 employees globally.

- **Amazon.com, Inc.** - Amazon briefly crossed the $1 trillion threshold in September 2018 and then again in early 2020. As of 2022, Amazon had about 1.52 million employees, making it one of the largest employers globally.

- **Alphabet Inc. (Google)** - Alphabet, the parent company of Google, reached a $1 trillion market capitalization in January 2020. As of 2022, Alphabet had approximately 187,000 employees.

- **Saudi Aramco** - Saudi Aramco, the Saudi Arabian oil and gas company, had the largest IPO in history and briefly held a market cap of over $2 trillion shortly after its listing in December 2019. Its market cap has fluctuated since then. As of 2022, Saudi Aramco had over 76,000 employees.

- **Tesla, Inc.** - Tesla's market cap exceeded $1 trillion in October 2021, making it the first carmaker to achieve this milestone. As of 2022, Tesla had roughly 100,000 employees.

These are a few examples, and the number of employees may have changed since these figures were reported, as companies regularly hire and restructure. Market capitalization can also fluctuate due to various factors, and these companies' market caps may have changed since the mentioned periods.

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
